content.title: Vievlog-Simahla Akukho mlinganiselo I-intanethi ifunda | Iikhosi, izixhobo kunye nesiqinisekiso
content.startLearningNow: Qala ngokufunda kwaye ulungiselele iimviwo namhlanje
content.learnIT: Yonwabela umgangatho ophezulu we-ITToraials, izifundo, kunye nezixhobo ezivela kubafundisi-ntsapho-zimahla.
content.learnFromExperts: Ifundiswa ngokufumana iingcali ze-IT kunye nootitshala.
content.anytimeAnywhere: Ukufunda ngokuthe ngqo nangaliphi na ixesha, naphi na
content.coverAllAspects: I-Cogns esisiseko yokuqhubela phambili inyanzelisile ukubandakanya ukufaka iikhowudi, iinkqubo, inethiwekhi, nangaphezulu.
content.viewAllIT: Bhrawuza zonke iikhosi zeVievlog kunye neemvavanyo zokuziqhelanisa

testimonial1.quote: I-Vievlog yandinceda ukuba ndigqithe iimviwo zam zesiqinisekiso.
testimonial1.name: Nguyen Minh Anh

testimonial3.quote: Enkosi kwiVievlog, ndizifezekise kakhulu izakhono zam zoqoqosho.
testimonial3.name: Leh huong

content.yourOneStopShop: Iqonga lakho lokumisa i-STOP lokuphumelela kwizakhono ze-IT kwaye lilungiselela iimviwo zesiqinisekiso. Fumana ukufikelela kumxholo wepremiyamu ngaphandle kwendleko!

metadata.lesson: Jonga izifundo zethu zasimahla kwaye ukhethe ikhosi egqibeleleyo yokutshatisa inqanaba lezakhono zakho.
